com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.FixedPartitionAttributes

  • Packages that use FixedPartitionAttributes 
    Package Description
    com.gemstone.gemfire.cache
    Provides an implementation of distributed object caching that can leverage GemFire's distribution capabilities.
